name: ESPL Programming File
summary: Learn about .SPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Ensign is financial software that traders and analysts often use to chart, analyze, and trade finances. Additionally, the ESPL programming language allows users to enhance and tailor the functionality of the software. For example, an analyst may use Ensign to create and execute SPT files to automate tasks, develop trading strategies, or perform complex data analysis.
NOTE: Ensign users can encrypt SPT files as LIB files when selling or distributing their programs to protect the source code and proprietary formulas from their customers.

instructions: You can open SPT files with Ensign Software Ensign in Windows. SInce SPT files store plain text, you can also open them with text editors, such as Microsoft Notepad (bundled with Windows) and Apple TextEdit (bundled with macOS).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
